    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="es">Reino Moneras</string>
            <string language="en">The monera kingdom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das monera Königreich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le royaume de monera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O reino do monera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il regno di monera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το βασίλειο monera</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Características generales del Reino Moneras, las partes de una bacteria y los tipos de bacterias, atendiendo a su forma. Todo ello viene ilustrado con imágenes estáticas.</string>
            <string language="en">General characteristics of the monera kingdom, the parts of a bacterium and types of bacteria according to their shape, illustrated with static images.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Moneras</string>
            <string language="en">Monera kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allgemeine Eigenschaften des monera 
Königreiches, die Teile eines Bakteriums und Typen des Bakteriums 
entsprechend ihrer Form, veranschaulicht mit statischen Bildern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractéristiques générales du royaume de 
monera, les parties d'une bactérie et types de bactéries selon leur 
forme, illustrés avec des images statiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Características gerais do reino do monera, as 
partes de uma bactéria e tipos de bactérias de acordo com sua forma,
ilustrados com imagens de estática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche generali del regno di monera, le 
parti di un batterio e tipi di batteri secondo la loro figura, 
illustrati con le immagini statiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γενικά χαρακτηριστικά του βασίλειου monera, τα μέρη
ενός βακτηριδίου και τύποι βακτηριδίων σύμφωνα με τη μορφή τους,
που διευκρινίζονται με τις στατικές εικόνες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Monera Königreich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
